__e: This is John's legacy as much as it is my own.
I DON'T WANT THAT TO BE MY FATHER'S LEGACY.
APPLAUSE This isn't just a business opportunity for me, but a way of protecting the legacy of a building I love.
Legacy is not something that I can be concerned with.
I don't think we've seen the end of his legacy, not by a long shot.
Your legacy will be nothing but death and blood.
They're part of my legacy and part of yours, so don't throw that away.
My good lady, a great evil has taken control of your legacy, and for your sake and the sake of all of your children, trust us.
You're forgetting my Uncle that made me choose between my legacy and the love of my life. Ah, yes.
Yeah, a man who's gonna die knowing that my father's legacy killed everyone in the city he loved so much.

He just shows up in my life, he knows about my work, he knows about my father's legacy...?

But, instead, he lost it all, His family's legacy and mine.
I'm sure you wouldn't, but our family legacy is at stake.

Not quite the legacy I had in mind, but I can live with it.
